measured_by: 7-point Likert scale rating question "How attractive is this lottery to you?"
justification: "In the rating phase, participants saw 60 lotteries and rated each of them on a 7-point Likert scale by clicking on one of seven radio buttons ... We asked participants to answer the following question: 'How attractive is this lottery to you?'"

"In the rating session participants saw 80 lottery pairs and rated each of them by clicking on a grey bar that signified the range of possible ratings ... The bar did not have pre-set values or distinct points, with participants able to click anywhere on the line."

measured_by: Binary lottery choice task (keyboard selection between two lotteries)
justification: "In the choice phase of the experiment, participants ... saw two lotteries ... and pressed <F> for the left and <J> for the right lottery"; these observed choices were later analyzed to assess decision accuracy and risk attitudes.
